info.name: Consent Validation API
info.description: A suite of apis for customer consent validation.

item.name: Provides an easy way for double opt-in to their traditional channel applications like USSD.

request.description: Confirms next action based on subscriber consent mostly for traditional channels.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

(Required) Client generated Id to include for tracing requests, so that the API can easily trace the HTTP request all the way from a client to MTNs backend processes (via our proxies). Each time a request is made to an MTN API the client should include a unique request reference in the HTTP Header. The value must be between 5 and 20 characters, and consist of ASCII letters, digits, or the characters +, /, =, and -. Invalid or blank IDs will be ignored and replaced with generated ones. MTN may use this to detect duplicate transactions from the client, but this functionality is not always guaranteed, so clients must make their own efforts to prevent duplicate transactions. MTN will also log the transactionId in order to assist with debugging and to correlate transactions processed by the API to requests from the client.
Encrypted ECW credentials

request.description: Manages Customer PreApproval information by specifying the from and to 'customerIds'. For most solution the to and from customer id's will be the same. This functionality is used when the preapprovals are used to preapprove future debit transaction between different parties.

response.name: Success

request.description: Manages existing Customer PreApproval information by been able to cancel a single or multiple preapprovals (this is based on what request parameters are sent).
